name: The Lost Donut
description:
Title: The Lost Donut

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Find the lost Donut if you can. This is a gray box level for
CSG-3813 at the University of Tulsa.

Instructions:
WASD to move
Space to jump
Mouse to look

Game Design Team
Brennan Crowder – Game Designer

This is only a grey box test level
